title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the selection is not registered.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label in the library file. 
2. Verify that the label is visible in the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view. Observe that the selection is not highlighted or registered.
OB: At the first attempt to select an item in the library outline view, the selection is not highlighted or registered.
EB: Upon selecting an item in the library outline view, the selection should be highlighted and registered.
SR:
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Verify that the label is visible in the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
